solution_line_template: In his senior year, Michael scored {junior_year_points} * {senior_year_increase_factor} = <<{junior_year_points}*{senior_year_increase_factor}={senior_year_points}>>{senior_year_points} points.
In both his senior and junior years Michael scored {junior_year_points} + {senior_year_points} = <<{junior_year_points}+{senior_year_points}={total_points}>>{total_points} points.
